titleStmt.title: The royal nursing-father; discoursed in a sermon preach'd at the cathedral in Norwich, on the 29th of May [B]eing the day of his Majesties birth, and happy return to his kingdoms. By Charles Robotham, batchelour of divinity, in Norfolk.
titleStmt.author: Robotham, Charles, 1625 or 6-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Oliver in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
